title: Lazy Lulu
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 39 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 130L
description: Lazy Lulu is the charming story of a chameleon who doesn't seem to be interested in much until a fly suddenly crosses her path. Colorful illustrations support simple text for emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine characters and setting as well as to practice retelling events in sequence.
meta: blows, feather, fly, lazy, leaf, seed
Story Elements : Determine setting and characters
Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Ss
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words by, not, sees

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
